about_html:
Window Saver {version}
Author: {author} / Shimatsu

This app automatically restores window position and size based on default values defined in the script.

You can modify these values directly in the Python file.

This project is part of the Shimatsu platform.
err_not_running: The window is not currently running.
tray_running: App is running in the background. Click the tray icon to open.
